com.bandyer.android_sdk.intent.chat

Interface IncomingChat

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Chat

    public IncomingChat
extends Chat

    Incoming Chat abstraction

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IncomingChat asNotification()
      Set the incoming chat to be displayed as notification
      void show(android.content.Context context)
      Display the incoming chat
      IncomingChat withAudioCallCapability(CallCapabilities callCapabilities, CallOptions callOptions)
      Audio call capability means that you can initialize an audio call from chat activity.
      IncomingChat withAudioUpgradableCallCapability(CallCapabilities callCapabilities, CallOptions callOptions)
      Audio call capability means that you can initialize an audio/video call from chat activity. Upgradable means that the call will be initialized as audio call but can be upgraded to video if selected camera button from call action items.
      IncomingChat withAudioVideoCallCapability(CallCapabilities callCapabilities, CallOptions callOptions)
      Audio video call capability means that you can initialize a video call from chat activity.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.bandyer.android_sdk.intent.chat.Chat

        getChatInfo

    • Method Detail

      • withAudioCallCapability

        IncomingChat withAudioCallCapability(CallCapabilities callCapabilities,
                                     CallOptions callOptions)

        Audio call capability means that you can initialize an audio call from chat activity.

        Parameters:
        callOptions - call options for the call from the chat UI such as recording,...
        callCapabilities - call capabilities such as whiteboard,file sharing, ...
        Returns:
        IncomingChat

      • withAudioUpgradableCallCapability

        IncomingChat withAudioUpgradableCallCapability(CallCapabilities callCapabilities,
                                               CallOptions callOptions)

        Audio call capability means that you can initialize an audio/video call from chat activity. Upgradable means that the call will be initialized as audio call but can be upgraded to video if selected camera button from call action items.

        Parameters:
        callOptions - call options for the call from the chat UI such as recording,...
        callCapabilities - call capabilities such as whiteboard,file sharing, ...
        Returns:
        IncomingChat

      • withAudioVideoCallCapability

        IncomingChat withAudioVideoCallCapability(CallCapabilities callCapabilities,
                                          CallOptions callOptions)

        Audio video call capability means that you can initialize a video call from chat activity.

        Parameters:
        callOptions - call options for the call from the chat UI such as recording,...
        callCapabilities - call capabilities such as whiteboard,file sharing, ...
        Returns:
        IncomingChat

      • asNotification

        IncomingChat asNotification()

        Set the incoming chat to be displayed as notification

        Returns:
        IncomingChat to be shown

      • show

        void show(android.content.Context context)

        Display the incoming chat

        Parameters:
        context - Context
